participant_1.background:
I am passionate about my family.
i know karate.
I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.
i have an older brother.
i enjoys kayaking in my free time.

participant_2.background:
I loved playing in the rain with my friends, even though we would get soaked.
i drive a nice car.
i have survived near death experiences.
i look forward to eating at restaurants.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.

content.text: Hello, how has your day been going?
Not too bad, thanks! I just got home from work. How about you?
It's been pretty good! I just got done kayaking with my family. We were at the petting zoo earlier today and I saw a lot of cute animals!
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love kayaking, but I've never been to a petting zoo. What kind of animals did you see?
We saw cows, pigs, goats, and rabbits. We even got to pet some of them!
That sounds so cute! I wish I could have been there.
It was a lot of fun! I'm glad we went.
What's your favorite part about kayaking?
I love being out on the water and being able to see all the different sights. It's also really peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's really fun and it's a great way to get exercise.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
